channel.title: My godwars has a simple glitch help?
channel.description: Hi my source is a 317 [pi] my godwars killcount wont raise when you kill the npcs how can i fix this?

look it dont work this is what i found inmy npc hander Goes the same for Bandos Sara And zammy

}
public boolean ArmadylKC(int i) {
switch(npcs[i].npcType) {
case 6222:
case 6223:
case 6225:
case 6230:
case 6239: // Aviansie
case 6227:
case 6232:
case 6229:
case 6233:
case 6231:
return true;

	}
